title: That Kiss
note:
That Kiss isn’t just the first track. It’s the reason this album exists.

It was the moment everything changed. No words, no preparation... just a kiss that shook me to my core.

It wasn’t soft or sweet. It was raw, real, and terrifying. It was the first time I knew, without a doubt, that everything I thought I knew about love was about to be rewritten.

This song is my way of going back to that moment. Because without it, none of this... not the album, not the life we’ve built... would have ever happened.
